scripts.dev: node -e "console.log('🔧 Starting Backend Development Server...')" && nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.db:generate: node -e "console.log('⚙️ Generating Prisma Client...')" && prisma generate
scripts.db:push: node -e "console.log('📤 Pushing database schema...')" && prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: node -e "console.log('🔄 Running database migrations...')" && prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:studio: node -e "console.log('🎨 Opening Prisma Studio...')" && prisma studio
scripts.db:reset: node -e "console.log('⚠️ Resetting database...')" && prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed:institution: node -e "console.log('🌱 Seeding institution data...')" && ts-node scripts/seedInstitutionData.ts
scripts.docker:logs: node -e "console.log('📋 Showing Docker logs...')" && docker-compose logs -f postgres-dev
scripts.docker:ps: node -e "console.log('📊 Docker container status...')" && docker-compose ps
scripts.docker:dev: node -e "console.log('🐳 Starting Docker Dev Environment...')" && docker-compose up postgres-dev
scripts.docker:prod: node -e "console.log('🐳 Starting Docker Production Environment...')" && docker-compose --profile prod up postgres-prod
scripts.docker:dev:build: node -e "console.log('🐳 Building and Starting Docker Dev Environment...')" && docker-compose up --build postgres-dev
scripts.docker:prod:build: node -e "console.log('🐳 Building and Starting Docker Production Environment...')" && docker-compose --profile prod up --build postgres-prod
scripts.docker:down: node -e "console.log('🛑 Stopping Docker containers...')" && docker-compose down
scripts.docker:down:volumes: node -e "console.log('🛑 Stopping Docker containers and removing volumes...')" && docker-compose down -v
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('🧪 Running Backend Tests...')" && node -e "console.log('⚠️ No tests configured yet')" && exit 0
